metadata.Title: CVE-2020-35495 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - low
metadata.Description: There's a flaw in binutils /bfd/pef.c. An attacker who is able to submit acrafted input file to be processed by the objdump program could cause anull pointer dereference. The greatest threat from this flaw is toapplication availability. This flaw affects binutils versions prior to2.34.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
